page.title: 16RAMSGATE TOWN LIBRARY
page.content: Ramsgate Library has several sections- Adult Lending,Children's Lending,Local Studies,Records/Cassettes,Reference, Museum & Gallery.Including Newington & Minster,the Library has 44,400 books. Miss Iris Huckstep,Chief Librarian has to decide which new books the Library should acquire.Busiest days are Monday & Saturday,with retired people being the most avid readers.Men prefer westerns & detective novels;ladies like romances;children enjoy space stories Catherine Cookson is the most popular author.The library's computer is much used & can be utilised to trace any book which is wanted.Children of all ages are encouraged to use the library Staff visit schools & playgroups,and organise holiday activities for young children.There is also a school library service.A survey of our parents showed that only 42% went to the library.
